text:
The Bengaluru police arrested at least six suspected Bodo militants in 2015. They had assumed fake identities and were working as labourers.

In January 2015, suspected Bodo militant identified as Bikhang Basumatri wanted in connection with killing of eight people from a tribal community in Lungsung on December 23, 2014, was nabbed by the city police. He was allegedly involved in killing six people in Kokrajhar district in 2013.

In January 2015, the CCB arrested the organising secretary of the National Democratic Front of Bodoland-Songbo, identified as Sanju Sibigiri, 29, from his hideout in Electronics City.

In June 2015, the Internal Security Division officials arrested Sandan Basumatri, Naseen Basumatri, Jibal Nursey and Tomar Basumatri associated with the Democratic Front of Bodoland. They had taken shelter in the city for one year.
title: At least six arrests in 2015
